message: Hi Bob, I have a great product I think you'd be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $180. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $120 is my minimum, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $150?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
